title: Flying Cars And Disruptive Innovation
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Intel’s drones chief forecasts flying cars in five years, in an interview published Sunday. That change is coming to cars seems evident by the fact that Intel plunked the not small sum of $15.3 billion for Mobileye two years ago. The trend toward self-driving vehicles will create winners and losers, impacting car companies, real estate, insurance, energy, local government and the job market. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:summary:
Intel’s drones chief forecasts flying cars in five years, in an interview published Sunday. That change is coming to cars seems evident by the fact that Intel plunked the not small sum of $15.3 billion for Mobileye two years ago. The trend toward self-driving vehicles will create winners and losers, impacting car companies, real estate, insurance, energy, local government and the job market.
